description: Streamlined and dependable since 1989, Chaco's Classic series is comprised of only 8 component parts, making for the simple, timeless sandal design that made their name. Every pair comes standard with adjustable straps that custom-fits to your foot, plus their podiatrist-certified LuvSeat™ PU footbed for all-day comfort and support. Now featuring ChacoGrip™ rubber for their best performing Classic outsole to date. Experience Chaco's Classic Sandal like never before.
name: Chaco Z/1 Classic - Mens
